titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives on Trumpcare, also known as the American Health Care Act of 2017.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives on Trumpcare, also known as the American Health Care Act of 2017.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Expresses support for efforts to ensure access to quality and affordable health care for all Americans and rejects any effort to take away health care from Americans.
